bench.name: Bench Press
bench.hotel_gym: Dumbbell bench press or DB floor press
bench.notes: Shoulders down and back, slight arch, touch lower chest, keep 1-3 reps in reserve.

rdl.name: Romanian Deadlift
rdl.notes: Soft knees, hinge hips back, flat back, feel hamstring tension, bar close to legs.

deadlift.name: Deadlift
deadlift.hotel_gym: DB deadlift or DB sumo deadlift or Smith deadlift
deadlift.no_equipment: Banded good morning or hip hinge pattern only
deadlift.notes: Bar over mid-foot, brace hard, push the floor away, keep bar close.

pullup.name: Pull-Up
pullup.hotel_gym: Assisted pull-up, lat pulldown, or heavy DB row
pullup.no_equipment: Band lat pulldown anchored in door
pullup.notes: Pull chest toward bar, drive elbows down, avoid shrugging, full control.

incline_press.name: Incline Press
incline_press.hotel_gym: Any incline DB press variation or Smith incline press
incline_press.notes: Press up and slightly toward midline, control the bottom position.

laterals.name: Lateral Raise
laterals.hotel_gym: Plate raises or cable lateral raises
laterals.notes: Soft elbows, raise to shoulder height, lead with elbows.

rear_delts.name: Rear Delt Fly
rear_delts.full_gym: DB rear delt fly or reverse pec deck
rear_delts.hotel_gym: Incline bench reverse fly with DBs
rear_delts.notes: Hinge slightly, pull hands out and back, avoid shrugging.

triceps_ext.name: Triceps Extension
triceps_ext.notes: Keep elbows pinned, extend fully without swinging shoulders.

hammer_curl.name: Hammer Curl
hammer_curl.notes: Neutral grip, elbows near sides, control the lowering.

row.name: Chest-Supported Row
row.full_gym: Chest-supported machine or incline bench DB row
row.no_equipment: Band row anchored at chest height
row.notes: Pull elbows toward hips, squeeze shoulder blades.

shoulder_press.name: Shoulder Press
shoulder_press.hotel_gym: Standing DB press or machine shoulder press
shoulder_press.notes: Press slightly in front of head, avoid flaring ribs.

lat_pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
lat_pulldown.notes: Lean slightly back, pull bar to upper chest, drive elbows down.

curl.name: Curl
curl.notes: Keep elbows close to sides, full range, control the eccentric.

overhead_triceps.name: Overhead Triceps Extension
overhead_triceps.full_gym: Cable or DB overhead triceps extension
overhead_triceps.notes: Keep elbows pointed forward, avoid arching the low back.

stepups.name: Step-Ups
stepups.hotel_gym: DB step-ups on hotel bench or sturdy surface
stepups.notes: Drive through whole foot, control the lowering, avoid pushing off the back leg too much.

core_plank.name: Plank
core_plank.notes: Brace abs, glutes tight, avoid sagging hips.

core_side_plank.name: Side Plank
core_side_plank.notes: Straight line from ankle to shoulder, avoid dropping hips.

core_deadbug.name: Dead Bug
core_deadbug.notes: Low back pressed into floor, move opposite arm and leg slowly.

core_hanging_knee.name: Hanging Knee Raise
core_hanging_knee.full_gym: Hanging knee raise from pull-up bar
core_hanging_knee.hotel_gym: Captains chair leg raise if available
core_hanging_knee.notes: Avoid swinging, control the up and down motion.

cable_lateral_raise.name: Cable Lateral Raise
cable_lateral_raise.full_gym: Cable lateral raise (single-arm or dual cable)
cable_lateral_raise.hotel_gym: DB lateral raise, plate raise, or band lateral raise
cable_lateral_raise.notes: Use light weight. Lead with the elbows. Raise to shoulder height. Keep tension all the way through.

rear_delt_cable_fly.name: Rear Delt Cable Fly
rear_delt_cable_fly.full_gym: Cable rear delt fly (cross cables or dual-cable)
rear_delt_cable_fly.notes: Set cables at shoulder height. Pull hands outward in a reverse fly motion. Avoid shrugging.
